title: what a load of rubbish
review: What a load of rubbish , honestly just crap, the best part of the movie was when the credits came up, no action, just sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo boring, oh my word, honestly I felt robbed in money and time, such a massive disappointment, doooo not bother watching it.

title: A absolutely awesome film
review: Just watch it. Incredible. Movies love or this are veryyyy veryyyy rare
